text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: …Jeez, even in your dreams you're still performing?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Hey you two, it seems that dessert is being served… hmm? As expected, it seems as though Ticket has run out of energy.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: I'll go and get us 3 servings of cake. Taishin, keep an eye on Ticket.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Yeah, yeah… Jeez, you're like a little kid, going full force until the very end, then running out of energy and falling asleep.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Uwah!? Wai- Hey…!! Ah, jeez… she's not waking up…!!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Ohh? The young ones sighed in sync… Still on cloud nine or somethin'?

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Yes… To get to sing together with you, Teio-san, and Rudolf-san…! It still doesn't feel real!

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: More importantly, it was so much fun! Again… I'd love to be able to experience that again…!!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Woa- They… They're too pure! Although I guess I knew that already.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: But yeah… You can experience that as many times as you want. As long as you continue to run with all you've got… doncha think?

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Eh!? Nature is going to sing with Satono and the others again!? No fair! No fair!! I wanna sing too!!

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text: I agree… After all, we've been giving it our all as well.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: Ahaha! You're right!! Then I guess it's our time to strike!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Uwah!? What's with you girls all of a sudden…? Wa-Wai-Wait! That hurts! Gueh…!
